verses.verse: And Joshua <WH3091> rose <WH7925> early <WH7925> in the morning; <WH1242> and they removed <WH5265> from Shittim, <WH7851> and came <WH935> to Jordan, <WH3383> he and all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and lodged <WH3885> there <WH8033> before <WH2962> they passed <WH5674> over. <WH5674>
And it came <WH1961> to pass after <WH7097> three <WH7969> days, <WH3117> that the officers <WH7860> went <WH5674> through <WH7130> the host; <WH4264>

And they commanded <WH6680> the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> When you see <WH7200> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and the priests <WH3548> the Levites <WH3881> bearing <WH5375> it, then you shall remove <WH5265> from your place, <WH4725> and go <WH1980> after <WH310> it.

Yet <WH389> there shall be a space <WH7350> between <WH996> you and it, about two thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520> by measure: <WH4060> come <WH7126> not near <WH7126> to it, that you may know <WH3045> the way <WH1870> by which <WH834> you must go: <WH3212> for you have not passed <WH5674> this way <WH1870> heretofore. <WH8543>
And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> Sanctify <WH6942> yourselves: for tomorrow <WH4279> the LORD <WH3068> will do <WH6213> wonders <WH6381> among <WH7130> you.

And Joshua <WH3091> spoke <WH559> to the priests, <WH3548> saying, <WH559> Take <WH5375> up the ark <WH727> of the covenant, <WH1285> and pass <WH5674> over <WH5674> before <WH6440> the people. <WH5971> And they took <WH5375> up the ark <WH727> of the covenant, <WH1285> and went <WH3212> before <WH6440> the people. <WH5971>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> This <WH2088> day <WH3117> will I begin <WH2490> to magnify <WH1431> you in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> that they may know <WH3045> that, as I was with Moses, <WH4872> so I will be with you.

And you shall command <WH6680> the priests <WH3548> that bear <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant, <WH1285> saying, <WH559> When you are come <WH935> to the brink <WH7097> of the water <WH4325> of Jordan, <WH3383> you shall stand <WH5975> still in Jordan. <WH3383>
And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> Come <WH5066> here, <WH5066> and hear <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

And Joshua <WH3091> said, <WH559> Hereby <WH2063> you shall know <WH3045> that the living <WH2416> God <WH410> is among <WH7130> you, and that he will without fail drive <WH3423> out from before <WH6440> you the Canaanites, <WH3669> and the Hittites, <WH2850> and the Hivites, <WH2340> and the Perizzites, <WH6522> and the Girgashites, <WH1622> and the Amorites, <WH567> and the Jebusites. <WH2983>
Behold, <WH2009> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH113> of all <WH3605> the earth <WH776> passes <WH5674> over <WH5674> before <WH6440> you into Jordan. <WH3383>
Now <WH6258> therefore take <WH3947> you twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> men <WH376> out of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel, <WH3478> out of every tribe <WH7626> a man. <WH376>

And it shall come <WH1961> to pass, as soon as the soles <WH3709> of the feet <WH7272> of the priests <WH3548> that bear <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the LORD, <WH3068> the LORD <WH113> of all <WH3605> the earth, <WH776> shall rest <WH5117> in the waters <WH4325> of Jordan, <WH3383> that the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> shall be cut <WH3772> off from the waters <WH4325> that come <WH3381> down <WH3381> from above; <WH4605> and they shall stand <WH5975> on an heap. <WH5067>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, <WH5674> when the people <WH5971> removed <WH5265> from their tents, <WH168> to pass <WH5674> over <WH5674> Jordan, <WH3383> and the priests <WH3548> bearing <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> the people; <WH5971>

And as they that bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> were come <WH935> to Jordan, <WH3383> and the feet <WH7272> of the priests <WH3548> that bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> were dipped <WH2881> in the brim <WH7097> of the water, <WH4325> (for Jordan <WH3383> overflows <WH4390> all <WH3605> his banks <WH1415> all <WH3605> the time <WH3117> of harvest, <WH7105>)

That the waters <WH4325> which came <WH3381> down <WH3381> from above <WH4605> stood <WH5975> and rose <WH6965> up on an heap <WH5067> very <WH3966> far <WH7368> from the city <WH5892> Adam, <WH121> that is beside <WH6654> Zaretan: <WH6891> and those that came <WH3381> down <WH3381> toward <WH5921> the sea <WH3220> of the plain, <WH6160> even the salt <WH4417> sea, <WH3220> failed, <WH8552> and were cut <WH3772> off: and the people <WH5971> passed <WH5674> over <WH5674> right against <WH5048> Jericho. <WH3405>

And the priests <WH3548> that bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> stood <WH5975> firm <WH3559> on dry <WH2724> ground in the middle <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> and all <WH3605> the Israelites <WH3478> passed <WH5674> over <WH5674> on dry <WH2724> ground, until <WH5704> all <WH3605> the people <WH1471> were passed <WH5674> clean <WH8552> over <WH5674> Jordan. <WH3383>
